summary: "Vladxn's Sulvar the Steady" adds the unused, mysterious NPC, named Sulvar the Steady, to his original location - Windhelm -.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Georgia][size=4][i]Vladxn's Sulvar the Steady" adds the unused, mysterious NPC, named Sulvar the Steady, to his original location - Windhelm -.

Listen closely to what he has to say and maybe you will hear about some of the "meta-lore" of the Elder Scrolls!

Beware, Cutting Room Floor will also add him, so if you have that mod installed, forget about this one!

[/i][/size][/font][color=#b6b6b6]-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/color]

[font=Georgia][size=5][i][b]By Vladxn[/b][/i][/size][/font]
author: Vladxn
